jme3test.post

Class TestRenderToMemory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.app.LegacyApplication
      • com.jme3.app.SimpleApplication
        • jme3test.post.TestRenderToMemory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Application, SceneProcessor, SystemListener

    public class TestRenderToMemory
extends SimpleApplication
implements SceneProcessor
    This test renders a scene to an offscreen framebuffer, then copies the contents to a Swing JFrame. Note that some parts are done inefficently, this is done to make the code more readable.
